de.steilerdev.whatToStudy.Functionalities

Class Evaluate

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.steilerdev.whatToStudy.Functionalities.Evaluate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Functionality

    public class Evaluate
extends java.lang.Object
implements Functionality
    This class is using the stored network or a user defined one to evaluate if the system can recommend the user to study a specific course. The evaluation is done using inference.

      Constructor and Description
      Evaluate()

      java.lang.Enum evaluateCase(Case currentCase)

      void run(java.lang.String[] args)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Evaluate

        public Evaluate()

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run(java.lang.String[] args)
         throws WhatToStudyException
        This function is loading the stored network or a user specified one and evaluates the given data against it. As a result the likeness of a very good or good grade is given.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Functionality
        Parameters:
        args - The command line arguments stated during the call of the application. The first argument is "-e", the second one is a CSV case file meeting its requirements and the third (optional) one is the file path to a user specified network file.
        Throws:
        WhatToStudyException - If an error occurs.

      • evaluateCase

        public java.lang.Enum evaluateCase(Case currentCase)
                            throws WhatToStudyException
        Evaluates the stated case using the internal network and standard values.
        Parameters:
        currentCase - The case that is going to be evaluated
        Returns:
        The recommended enumeration (Either a Course or a FinalGrade (Recommendation for with FinalGrade.Very_Good, against FinalGrade.Failed or neither FinalGrade.Satisfying).
        Throws:
        WhatToStudyException - If an error occurs.

      • evaluateCase

        public java.lang.Enum evaluateCase(Case currentCase,
                                   norsys.netica.Net net,
                                   norsys.netica.Environ env)
                            throws WhatToStudyException
        Evaluates the case using variable values.
        Parameters:
        currentCase - The case that is going to be evaluated
        net - The net that is going to be used to evaluate the network
        env - The environment used to evaluate the case
        Returns:
        The recommended enumeration (Either a Course or a FinalGrade (Recommendation for with FinalGrade.Very_Good, against FinalGrade.Failed or neither FinalGrade.Satisfying).
        Throws:
        WhatToStudyException - If an error occurs.
